changes.title: Changelog
changes.description:
-Made sure that the changelog is now sorted by version
-Added functionality for line separation in the changelog
-Patched a bug where you could not see any new changes when there are too many

changes.title: Rectangle
changes.description: Added support for rounded gradient rectangles, which can have up to 4 colors

changes.title: ClickGUI
changes.description: Redesigned some parts of the clickGUI, now using the module toggled color in the background for a more colorful look

changes.title: InventoryMove
changes.description: Fixed issue with mouse cursor visibility

changes.title: Source
changes.description: Removed \"Triangle.glsl\" from the source code, as it did not work as intended
